mapper.insert: insert into klx_quote (ID, CLIENT_INQUIRY_ID, SUPPLIER_QUOTE_ID, COMPLETE, UPDATE_DATETIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clientInquiryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierQuoteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{complete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into klx_quote
ID,
CLIENT_INQUIRY_ID,
SUPPLIER_QUOTE_ID,
COMPLETE,
UPDATE_DATETIME,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update klx_quote
CLIENT_INQUIRY_ID = #{clientInquiryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUPPLIER_QUOTE_ID = #{supplierQuoteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMPLETE = #{complete,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT kq.* FROM klx_quote kq LEFT JOIN klx_quote_element kqe ON kqe.KLX_QUOTE_ID = kq.ID WHERE kq.COMPLETE = 1 AND kq.SUPPLIER_QUOTE_ID IS NULL AND kqe.ID IS NOT NULL
